snippet.title: Arboria - Official Game Overview Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In Arboria, you'll play as Troll Warrior, in need of the best equipment to survive against deadly monsters to save your tribe, all while appeasing the mysterious Gods. Arboria's trailer reveals it is available in early access on Steam and releasing in full later this year.

#IGN #SummerofGaming
